description: Compels an entity to stop at their current location, turn to face a mob they are targeting, and react with an event.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Hold Ground Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: The mob freezes and looks at the mob they are targeting.

fields.title: Broadcast
fields.description: Whether to broadcast out the mob's target to other mobs of the same type.

fields.title: Broadcast Range
fields.description: Range in blocks for how far to broadcast.

fields.title: Min Radius
fields.description: Minimum distance the target must be for the mob to run this goal.

fields.title: Within Radius Event
fields.description: Event to run when target is within the radius. This event is broadcasted if broadcast is true.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
